caption.p: Estimated rainfall erosivity for Brazilian regions through 21 st century. ( a) RCP4.5 scenario of HadGEM2-ES model for three periods (2007–2040, 2041–2070 and 2071–2099). ( b) RCP8.5 scenario of HadGEM2-ES model for three periods (2007–2040, 2041–2070 and 2071–2099). ( c) RCP4.5 scenario of MIROC5 model for three periods (2007–2040, 2041–2070 and 2071–2099). ( d) RCP8.5 scenario of MIROC5 model for three periods (2007–2040, 2041–2070 and 2071–2099). Values in MJ mm ha −1 h −1 year −1. Maps created with ESRI ArcGIS 10.1 ( www.esri.com).
